identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

block.p: LEAD: The singer Adelaide Hall will open a four-night cabaret series at Weill Recital Hall on Oct. 12 at 8 P.M. Karen Mason will appear on Oct. 13; Steve Ross will offer songs by Coward and Porter on Oct. 14, and Andrea Marcovicci will sing love songs from the theater on Oct. 15. Tickets -which go on sale at the box office on Wednesday - are $15, or $52 for all four nights.

Tickets -which go on sale at the box office on Wednesday - are $15, or $52 for all four nights.

Karen Mason will appear on Oct. 13; Steve Ross will offer songs by Coward and Porter on Oct. 14, and Andrea Marcovicci will sing love songs from the theater on Oct. 15. Tickets -which go on sale at the box office on Wednesday - are $15, or $52 for all four nights. Information: 247-7800.
